title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 267 - Requirements Concerning City Of Yonkers Earnings Tax Returns, Notices, Records And Statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 267 - Requirements Concerning City Of Yonkers Earnings Tax Returns, Notices, Records And Statements

State Regulations
§ 267.1 - Permanent books of account or records and contents of City of Yonkers earnings tax returns and other forms
§ 267.2 - Records to be kept by farmers and wage earners
§ 267.3 - Form of records
§ 267.4 - Records of employers and other persons required to file returns of information
§ 267.5 - Notice by State Tax Commission requiring City of Yonkers earnings tax returns, statements, or the keeping of records
§ 267.6 - Copies of City of Yonkers earnings tax returns, schedules and statements
§ 267.7 - Place for keeping records
§ 267.8 - Retention of records
§ 267.9 - City of Yonkers partnership returns
§ 267.10 - Notice of qualification as receiver, etc
§ 267.11 to 267.27 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. D, pt. 267

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§ 171, 697[a], 1342; Codes
and Ordinances of the City of Yonkers, §
92-113

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
